about.person_img_alt: Person working with a laptop on their lap, comfortable and relaxed.
about.title: Who is Maxyni?
about.description_1: Maxyni was born to simplify how companies manage their processes and make decisions.
about.description_2: More than just creating digital products, we want to be a reference. We believe that technology should be accessible and intuitive. That's why we develop solutions designed for companies of all sizes and sectors.
about.description_3: What sets us apart? People, quality, and care. Everything we do aims to facilitate the day-to-day of companies and positively impact people. Our essence is to deliver quality in every detail.

best_choice.title: Why are we your best choice?
best_choice.description: Some companies offer software — we deliver complete solutions. And what makes us unique? Here are some of the reasons why Maxyni is the right choice for your business:

support.title: Support
support.description: Our humanized service is always ready to help and solve any problem, ensuring that your day-to-day flows without complications.

customization.icon_alt: Watercolor with brush and color palette
customization.title: Customization
customization.description: We understand that each business is unique. That's why our systems are highly customizable and adaptable, providing comfort and efficiency for you.

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: We have an incredible speed for releasing updates. We're constantly bringing new solutions and features to you because innovation is part of our DNA.

solutions.person_img_alt: Person wearing virtual reality glasses impressed with Maxyni's solutions.
solutions.title: Solutions to Reach the MAXIMUM
solutions.description_1: Unlock the full potential of your business with Maxyni's solutions!
solutions.description_2: Each product is developed with a focus on real needs of day-to-day operations, considering the pain points and challenges of each area. Our products are designed to be intuitive, efficient, and robust, ensuring ease of use without compromising performance.
solutions.custom_description: Unlock the full potential of your business with Maxyni's solutions! We create custom digital experiences that transform vision into reality.

institutional_sites.title: Institutional Websites
institutional_sites.description: Digital showcases that present your brand to the world with an elegant and professional design.
institutional_sites.ideal_for: Companies that want to establish an online presence, strengthen their brand, and communicate values.

ecommerce.title: E-commerce
ecommerce.description: Complete online stores, optimized for conversion and with an excellent shopping experience for your customers.
ecommerce.ideal_for: Businesses that want to sell products online, expand their reach, and automate sales.

web_systems.title: Web Systems
web_systems.description: Custom applications that automate processes and unify data in a central platform.
web_systems.ideal_for: Companies that need to optimize workflows, eliminate manual processes, and centralize information.

products.title: Discover our products:
products.li_1: Currently, we develop Fullstack Web Apps tailored for small and medium-sized businesses. Our focus is on automating processes and saving time, allowing your team to focus on what really matters.
products.li_2: For the future, we're working on multi-tenant SaaS solutions, such as Ahssets, a complete platform for asset and internal inventory management. With an emphasis on scalability and security, these tools promise to transform how you manage your business. Stay tuned!

footer.slogan: Developing the future that has already arrived.
